name: Gravity Ranger
description:
Gravity Ranger is a action platformer game made for the CGA Jam 2017

CONTROLS :  

- WASD to move 

- Arrow Keys to Shoot

- Press Space Key to Toggle Normal/Low Gravity

- Glide in Air using the Gun's Recoil

- Navigate Menu using Mouse

FEATURES : 

- Lowering The Gravity 

- Minimalistc Art Style

- Juicy Particle FX

- Easy Gameplay

- Deadly Enemies and Hazards

- 7(for now) Neatly Desigined Levels

- Wiggly Checkpoints

- MENU

Hope you enjoy my game. Please leave feedback :D
